mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, ( SELECT p.name FROM sys_menu p WHERE p.menu_id = m.parent_id ) AS parentName, m.name, m.url, m.perms, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_menu m ORDER BY m.order_num ASC
SELECT menu_id, parent_id, name, type FROM sys_menu WHERE type != 2 ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT menu_id, parent_id, name, url, type, icon FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, gmt_create ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{name}, #{url}, #{perms}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{orderNum}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, ( SELECT p.name FROM sys_menu p WHERE p.menu_id = m.parent_id ) AS parentName, m.name, m.url, m.perms, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_menu m WHERE menu_id = #{value}

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.uri, m.method FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND (m.type = 2 OR m.type = 3)

SELECT p.menu_id, p.parent_id, p.`name`, p.url, p.type, p.icon, c.menu_id AS c_menu_id, c.parent_id AS c_parent_id, c.`name` AS c_name, c.url AS c_url, c.type AS c_type, c.icon AS c_icon FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.url, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ( m.parent_id = 0 OR m.parent_id IS NULL ) ) p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.url, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ( m.parent_id != 0 OR m.parent_id IS NOT NULL ) ) c ON p.menu_id = c.parent_id ORDER BY p.order_num ASC, c.order_num ASC
